content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Chinese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

Voice message
content.question: Why does Liping ask to change the plan?

choices.label: She has to run an errand for her mother.
She needs to meet someone at school.

content.answer: She has to run an errand for her mother.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
